circumstances:
On final approach to Berlin-Gatow Airport, the four engine aircraft banked left and crashed few hundred yards short of runway threshold. The aircraft was destroyed and all three crew members were killed. They were performing a cargo flight from Northolt, taking part to the Berlin Airlift. 
Crew:
Cpt Cecil Golding, pilot, 
Henry Thomas Newman, copilot,
Peter James Edwards, radio operator.
